meanings.definition: A cardinal number representing one thousand million.
meanings.sent1: The company made a profit of one billion dollars last year.
meanings.sent2: There are over seven billion people in the world.
meanings.sent3: I have a billion chores to do before the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a billion sunsets.
meanings.sent5: The star shone like a billion diamonds in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A very large number or amount.
meanings.sent1: He had a billion ideas for the project.
meanings.sent2: The universe is filled with a billion galaxies.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over a billion books off the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a billion bells.
meanings.sent5: The forest was alive with a billion chirping birds.
